com.softwareag.natural.mapconverter

Class MapxmlPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.softwareag.natural.mapconverter.MapxmlPage

  • public class MapxmlPage
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the contents of a mapxml file in a convenient form for further processing. MapxmlPage objects are the representation of the extended map extract.

    In addition to the map extract created via the map extractor tool it contains GridArea and SequenceArea objects.
    A MapxmlPageFor each row a list of SDO objects representing the columns of a row is hold. The SDO object could be of the following type:
    • IfField
    • LtLiteral
    • SequenceArea
    • GridArea
    • EmptyArea
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1.4.5 $
    Author:
    zim

    • Method Detail

      • addRowItem

        public void addRowItem(int row,
                       DataObject item)
        Adds the specified item to the row.
        Parameters:
        row - the row number starting with 1
        item - the item to add

      • createRow

        public void createRow(int row)
        Creates a new row with the specified row number if a corresponding row does not already exist.

        If rows 1..row don't exist yet they are already created.
        Parameters:
        row - the row number starting with 1

      • deleteRow

        public void deleteRow(int row)
        Deletes the specified row in the mapxml. This will decrease the number of rows.
        Parameters:
        row - the number of the row starting with 1

      • findGridAreas

        public java.util.Collection findGridAreas()
        Returns a collection of all GridArea objects in the MapxmlPage object. Each GridArea object does only occur once in the collection. The order of the GridArea objects within the collection is undefined.
        Returns:
        a collection of GridArea objects

      • getCols

        public java.util.List getCols(int row)
        Returns the list of items in the row with the specified number.
        Parameters:
        row - the row number starting with 1.
        Returns:
        the list of items in this row

      • getDataField

        public DfField getDataField(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the data field with the specified name as SDO Object. If no data field with the specified name exists, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the requested field
        Returns:
        the DfField object or null.

      • getRowCount

        public int getRowCount()
        Returns count of rows existing in this mapxml.
        Returns:
        the row count

      • removeRow

        public void removeRow(int row)
        Removes all items from the specifed row. Adds one EmptyArea item. Notice that you customize the EMPTYAREA rule in the rules file. The rule can dynamically define the controls per row.
        Parameters:
        row - the number of the row starting with 1

      • serializeToXML

        public java.lang.String serializeToXML()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes this object to an XML string.
        Returns:
        the extended map extract as an XML String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
